title: Torque ranking - F0 2F0 and 3F0 exerted on board

content.question: A board can pivot about a hinge at its right end, as shown in the figure. Three upward forces of different magnitudes are exerted on the board at different locations as indicated. With respect to the pivot, which of the following correctly ranks the magnitudes of the torques <math alttext="tau sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="tau sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="tau sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> resulting from the forces <math alttext="F sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="2 F sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="3 F sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="tau sub 3 is greater than tau sub 2, which is greater than tau sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="tau sub 2 is greater than tau sub 1, which equals tau sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="tau sub 1 is greater than tau sub 2, which is greater than tau sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="tau sub 1 equals tau sub 3, which is greater than tau sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="tau sub 2 is greater than tau sub 1, which equals tau sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
